name: Exorcist Girl
description:
You can play on google play
Tap the Google Play button at the bottom!

The girl enters the school for to exorcise the ghost.

Can a girl exorcise all ghosts and make the school safe?

There are 15 stages in total, and the play time is 30 minutes to 1 hour.

-In 3*3 compartments, you can touch ghosts in the correct way to exorcise them.

- If you don't lose in time, you win.

-You can check the exorcism method again by pressing the scroll and paper button in the game!

※This game has no cloud save. If you erase the game or change the machine, save data disappears.
